form.official-title: To direct Federal departments and agencies to verify eligibility for Federal benefits for individuals 95 years of age or older, and for other purposes.

section.header: Verification of eligibility for Federal benefits for certain elderly individuals

subsection.text: The head of each Federal department or agency that provides Federal benefits to individuals who have attained 95 years of age or more shall take appropriate steps to ensure, on a semiannual basis, that each such individual remains eligible for such benefits.
The head of each Federal department or agency specified in paragraph (1) may issue regulations to implement this section.
This section shall apply with respect to payments of Federal benefits made on or after December 31, 2024.
